valueString.value: The base language in which the resource is written.

A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human. The narrative need not encode all the structured data, but is required to contain sufficient detail to make it "clinically safe" for a human to just read the narrative. Resource definitions may define what content should be represented in the narrative to ensure clinical safety.

text.value: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

valueString.value: These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

text.value: Contained, inline Resources

valueString.value: Identifies the broad category of service being performed or delivered. Selecting a Service Category then determines the list of relevant service types that can be selected in the Primary Service Type.

valueString.value: The specific type of service being delivered or performed.

text.value: The specific type of service being delivered or performed

valueString.value: Collection of Specialties handled by the Service Site. This is more of a Medical Term.

text.value: Collection of Specialties handled by the Service Site. This is more of a Medical Term

valueString.value: Further description of the service as it would be presented to a consumer while searching.

text.value: Further description of the service as it would be presented to a consumer while searching

valueString.value: Any additional description of the service and/or any specific issues not covered by the other attributes, which can be displayed as further detail under the serviceName.

text.value: Any additional description of the service and/or any specific issues not covered by the other attributes, which can be displayed as further detail under the serviceName

valueString.value: Extra details about the service that can't be placed in the other fields.

text.value: Extra details about the service that can't be placed in the other fields

valueString.value: If there is a photo/symbol associated with this HealthcareService, it may be included here to facilitate quick identification of the service in a list.

text.value: If there is a photo/symbol associated with this HealthcareService, it may be included here to facilitate quick identification of the service in a list

valueString.value: List of contacts related to this specific healthcare service. If this is empty, then refer to the location's contacts.

text.value: List of contacts related to this specific healthcare service. If this is empty, then refer to the location's contacts

valueString.value: The location(s) that this service is available to (not where the service is provided).

text.value: The location(s) that this service is available to (not where the service is provided)

valueString.value: The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered.

text.value: The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered

valueString.value: Does this service have specific eligibility requirements that need to be met in order to use the service.

text.value: Does this service have specific eligibility requirements that need to be met in order to use the service

valueString.value: The description of service eligibility should, in general, not exceed one or two paragraphs. It should be sufficient for a prospective consumer to determine if they are likely to be eligible or not. Where eligibility requirements and conditions are complex, it may simply be noted that an eligibility assessment is required. Where eligibility is determined by an outside source, such as an Act of Parliament, this should be noted, preferably with a reference to a commonly available copy of the source document such as a web page.

text.value: Describes the eligibility conditions for the service

valueString.value: Program Names that can be used to categorize the service.

text.value: Program Names that can be used to categorize the service

valueString.value: Collection of Characteristics (attributes).

text.value: Collection of Characteristics (attributes)

valueString.value: Ways that the service accepts referrals, if this is not provided then it is implied that no referral is required.

text.value: Ways that the service accepts referrals

valueString.value: The public part of the 'keys' allocated to an Organization by an accredited body to support secure exchange of data over the internet. To be provided by the Organization, where available.

text.value: The public part of the 'keys' allocated to an Organization by an accredited body to support secure exchange of data over the internet. To be provided by the Organization, where available

valueString.value: Indicates whether or not a prospective consumer will require an appointment for a particular service at a Site to be provided by the Organization. Indicates if an appointment is required for access to this service.

text.value: Indicates if an appointment is required for access to this service
